meanings.definition: A display technology that uses multiple screens to show content simultaneously.
meanings.sent1: The multiscreen in the conference room allows everyone to see the presentation clearly.
meanings.sent2: I love watching movies on a multiscreen setup at home.
meanings.sent3: The museum's multiscreen exhibit made learning about space fun and interactive.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a multiscreen, processing information from various sources at once.
meanings.sent5: The sports bar's multiscreen display made it easy to keep track of all the games.

meanings.definition: To use multiple screens to view different content at the same time.
meanings.sent1: I often multiscreen when working on my computer, with one screen for research and another for writing.
meanings.sent2: During the webinar, the presenter showed how to multiscreen effectively for increased productivity.
meanings.sent3: She likes to multiscreen when watching TV, scrolling through social media on her phone at the same time.
meanings.sent4: The tech-savvy team decided to multiscreen their monitors for better multitasking capabilities.
meanings.sent5: Multiscreening can be challenging but rewarding when managing multiple tasks efficiently.
